title: UNDA by Seroyal
cleaned_text: half a century, Unda has prided itself on manufacturing what they consider to be the purest homeopathic products in the world. Started in Belgium, Unda creates unique, complex remedies of all types, formulated from both plants and metals. Each Unda remedy is based on the integrated principles and theories of oligotherapy, botany, anthroposophy, traditional Chinese medicine and homeopathy. Unda only utilizes the purest ingredients, such as herbs that are bio-dynamically grown or wild-crafted, which has helped them become one of the top Healthcare Practitioner Brands in the industry.
